meta.description: Connect your Intercom workspace to manage contacts, companies, conversations, and teams.

options.label: Tags
options.description: A tag allows you to label your contacts, companies, and conversations and list them using that tag.

options.label: Companies
options.description: Companies allow you to represent organizations using your product. Each company will have its own description and be associated with contacts. You can fetch, create, update and list companies.

options.label: Contacts
options.description: Contacts represent your leads and users in Intercom.

options.label: Notes
options.description: Notes allow you to annotate and comment on your contacts.

options.label: Teams
options.description: Teams are groups of admins in Intercom.

options.label: Admins
options.description: Admins are teammate accounts that have access to a workspace.

options.label: Conversations
options.description: Conversations are how you can communicate with users in Intercom.

options.label: Segments
options.description: A segment is a group of your contacts defined by the rules that you set.

meta.description: Select the Intercom resource to work with.
